title: Toronto Maple Leafs' Morgan Rielly keeping busy, doing 'some reflecting' during NHL pause - TSN
description: Toronto Maple Leafs' Morgan Rielly keeping busy, doing 'some reflecting' during NHL pause TSN Morgan Rielly and Tessa Virtue are the pandemic love story we need right now The Globe and Mail Leafs defenceman Morgan Rielly has had time for reflection, and he ha…
content: Settled back in his hometown of North Vancouver Toronto Maple Leafs defenceman Morgan Rielly is still searching for a new normal amid the global COVID pandemic that forced the NHL to pause its season three weeks ago There s no escaping it and it chars
